long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Daily task tracker app. Resets daily tasks every day if completed and deleted non daily completed tasks each day.

Uses Chrome sync storage, so you can write something and have it on any other pc if you login with the same gmail.

Its very lightweight no database used, just a simple app I made for myself since i needed something like this, expect a lot of updates coming up.

Current Features:
- Daily quests always stay and get reset at the end of the day if marked as completed
- Text input detects links pasted and shows a clickable icon after submitting input
- Non-daily quests get deleted at the end of the day if marked as completed
- Export your data and save it offline
- Dark Mode
